item.title: Lots of metal dumped by the sports centre., 21st February
item.description:
Sports centre has had work done and they’ve dumped metal on the grass area and on the path around the park. This is extremely hazardous to people and animals.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Thanet Road, North End, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The road ia blicked by trees from the house on the corner, 21st February
item.description:
I order to pass you have to go into the road where cars are passing. Anyone with sight issues or mobility problems can be put at risk. Trees need to be cut down. Even the castor street sign is covered
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Daniel Gardens, Old Kent Road, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pothole around a manhole, 21st February
item.description:
